abstract: It's not the most exciting product category, but label printers are the unsung heroes of home organization. Epson has some new models out.
snippet: It's not the most exciting product category, but label printers are the unsung heroes of home organization. Epson has some new models out.
lead_paragraph: There's no glory in writing about label printers. Yet today will end and tomorrow the sun will rise and millions will look at the unlabeled boxes and cartons in their junk closet and say "I wish I had some way of labeling those."
